title: Can I get some help? Please? I just lost 15 LP from a ranked game from the game disconnecting me.
body:
Not ME disconnecting FROM the game.

> I just lost 15 LP from a ranked game because my loading screen froze.
> 
> This has happened to me before but it had something to do with my computer. However, this time I'm pretty sure it's on this end since the website takes several minutes to load. I just lost a game's worth of LP. While not a big deal to most people, I'm just now starting ranked and I was wondering if this could be reversed. IF THIS WAS ON YOUR END.
> 
> The second attached image is the "please check your internet" when again it's not me. And the third attached image is showing "THIS."

This is directly taken from a support ticket since I can't even post in the Support section since uploading files is apparently impossible since I'm pretty sure  this is not on my end and can I please have a riot speak to me here since I CAN'T POST MY SCREENSHOTS IN THE SUPPORT SECTION and it takes 3 reloads to even load a site that's related to riot, and not get something like this:

https://imgur.com/a/vSYKv

And these are the screenshots that I was refering to:

https://i.imgur.com/Z1YVY3f.jpg
https://i.imgur.com/7BAn3p0.png
https://imgur.com/a/FvsNZ

AGAIN, my internet works fine on any other website, it's just riot related when something is absurdly slow.

The time is now 5:07pm PST compared to the images of when it happened.

replies.body: I already figured out the problem, graphics cards needed to be updated.

Yeeeep that'll do it too sometimes. A little troubleshooting goes a long way! If this happens again, make sure to double check those drivers and the other steps in the [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) if that doesn't help at first.

If you keep getting disconnected from games and having problems accessing Riot websites, it's not necessarily out of the question to think that your network is having problems contacting our servers specifically. Grab some network logs from the game that froze if you can and have our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan them to see what might be going on. After that, post a screenshot of what it spits out here so that I can go over it with ya!
